languages.text: This creature kills its weakest ally, healing themselves and increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This sacrifice also increases their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance.

languages.text: 此生物会杀死最弱的盟友来恢复生命值，同时提高{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}。此外，牺牲还会提高此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}。

languages.text: Существо убивает своего самого слабого союзника, исцеляясь и повышая значение своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, а также {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шанса критического попадания{/g}.

This sacrifice also increases their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance.

Существо убивает своего самого слабого союзника, исцеляясь и повышая значение своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, а также {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}шанса критического попадания{/g}.

languages.text: この生物は最も弱い味方を殺し、自身を癒し、その{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}を増やす。この犠牲によって、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}の率も上昇する。
languages.original_text: This creature kills its weakest ally, healing themselves and increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This sacrifice also increases their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance.

traits.locale_text: この生物は最も弱い味方を殺し、自身を癒し、その{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}を増やす。この犠牲によって、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルヒット{/g}の率も上昇する。

languages.text: Esta criatura mata a su aliado más débil, curándose y aumentando sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. El sacrificio también aumenta su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature kills its weakest ally, healing themselves and increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This sacrifice also increases their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura mata a su aliado más débil, curándose y aumentando sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}. El sacrificio también aumenta su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}impacto crítico{/g}.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur tötet ihren schwächsten Verbündeten, heilt sich dabei selbst und erhöht ihre {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}. Dieses Opfer erhöht außerdem ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature kills its weakest ally, healing themselves and increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This sacrifice also increases their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur tötet ihren schwächsten Verbündeten, heilt sich dabei selbst und erhöht ihre {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}. Dieses Opfer erhöht außerdem ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritische Treffer{/g}chance.

languages.text: Cette créature élimine son allié le plus faible afin de se soigner et d'accroître le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} de sa réserve. Ce sacrifice augmente également sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} et ses chances de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature kills its weakest ally, healing themselves and increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This sacrifice also increases their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} chance.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature élimine son allié le plus faible afin de se soigner et d'accroître le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} de sa réserve. Ce sacrifice augmente également sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g} et ses chances d'infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}coup critique{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, en zayıf dost birimini öldürür ve kendini iyileştirerek {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanını artırır. Ayrıca yaptığı bu eylemle {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} niteliğini ve {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} olasılığını da artırır.
